Once created new virtual environment need to activate and add to path
To activate:
source env/bin/activate

To add to path:
Enter in terminal: sudo nano /etc/paths
Add path at end of this, e.g.: /matt/Python/flask-tutorial/env/bin
ctrl + x to quit
y to save

enter to come out
